$ ick run --dry-run --apply
Only one of --dry-run, --patch, and --apply can be provided
(exit status: 1)
$ ick run --dry-run --patch
Only one of --dry-run, --patch, and --apply can be provided
(exit status: 1)
$ ick run --patch --apply
Only one of --dry-run, --patch, and --apply can be provided
(exit status: 1)
$ ick run --dry-run --patch --apply
Only one of --dry-run, --patch, and --apply can be provided
(exit status: 1)
